Class DisplayableSurface

  • Object
    • AbstractTask
      • AbstractDisplayable
        • DisplayableSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLDisplayable, Task, Runnable

    public class DisplayableSurface
extends AbstractDisplayable
    Author:
    JeT A displayable surface is a displayable containing GL geometries matching IMultiSurfaces or IPolygon geoxygen geometries
